articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Combined Unit 655
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Combined Unit 655
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided general tactical  exercises of KPA Combined Unit 655 held on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the KPA.
					 He was greeted by KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, KPA Vice Marshal Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Choe Pu Il and KPA Col. Gen. Son Chol Ju before the observation post of the training field.
					
					 Waiting for him in the field were Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, Pak Jae Gyong, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Yun Jong Rin, Jo Kyong Chol, Pak Jong Chon and members of the NDC, staff members of the KPA Supreme Command and commanding officers of the KPA large combined units.
					
					 Watching the exercises were Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Pak To Chun, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Kwak Pom Gi, O Il Jong, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Han Kwang Sang, Kim Myong Guk, and leading officials of the party, state and armed forces organs, members of the party central guidance bodies in Pyongyang, officials of ministries and national institutions and those in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health, media and defence industry and KPA officers and men.
					
					 After receiving a salute from the chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Jong Un mounted an observation post before being briefed on the plan and distribution of units for the exercises.
					
					 He issued an order to start the exercises.
					
					 The moment stormy roars of powerful firepower strike means rocked heaven and earth with ceaseless shower of shells and bombs. Brave flying corps struck targets one after another leaving trails in the sky. Tanks and armored cars made a dash at the "enemy's positions" and a-match-for-a hundred fighters occupied the "enemy's posts" in a moment.
					
					 Volley firing roared, rending the air, and the "enemy's positions" clouded with powder smoke turned to the sea of fire in no time.
					
					 Expressing satisfaction over the successful exercises to which the Juche war methods were applied, he set forth important tasks for further rounding off the combat preparations of the KPA.
					
					 In order to accomplish generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche, the Songun revolutionary cause which was pioneered in the thick forest of Mt. Paektu, it is necessary to continue paying big efforts to strengthening the KPA, he said.
					
					 All the officers and men should firmly prepare themselves to be stalwart fighters possessed of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's invincible strategies and tactics, brave attack mode and perfect capacity for fighting an actual war, he noted.
					
					 He called for mercilessly wiping out the enemies with the arms of justice and revenge if they dare provoke.
					
					 The Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses will shine forever as an indestructible fortress as it is being defended by the heroic KPA that has grown to be iron-willed and matchless elite army under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il over the past 80 years, he stressed.
					
					 He had a photo session with major commanding officers of the KPA, staff members of the KPA Supreme Command, commanding officers of the KPA large combined units and officials who accompanied him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert by Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert by Unhasu Orchestra
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, enjoyed with Pyongyangites the concert "Let Us Not Forget the Pledge Made to the Revolution" given by the Unhasu Orchestra at the People's Theatre in celebration of the 80th anniversary of the KPA.
					 The performance began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were prelude "Let Us Not Forget the Pledge Made to the Revolution", male duet and chorus "We Will Defend Han Byol", orchestral music and chorus of the immortal classic "Song of Anti-Japanese War", mixed quartet and chorus "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung", female quintet "We Sing of Our Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem", chorus "Ballad of Mt. Singo", female solo and pangchang "Song of Love for People", children's quartet "We Are Happy", chorus "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order", female solo "Under the Banner of the Party", narration and orchestral music "Our Arms Say" and chorus "Korea, Advance" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers vividly depicted the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea that is eternally glorified thanks to the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the rosy future that is in store for Korea as it has Kim Jong Un at the top post of the WPK, state and army.
					
					 The concert ended with the immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Il Sung".
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the successful performance.
					
					 He gave the highest appreciation to the orchestra, saying it is an art troupe to which Kim Jong Il had shown particular care.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the artistes of the orchestra will arouse more dynamically the service personnel and people to the general advance of the Songun revolution through their performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Kyong Ok and Kim Myong Guk.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Korean Residents in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Korean Residents in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with the visiting delegation of Korean residents in Japan for commemorating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung led by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Chongwadae Senior Presidential Secretary's Outbursts under Fire
articles.content:
Chongwadae Senior Presidential Secretary's Outbursts under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Friday made public the following information bulletin No. 996:
					 Chon Yong U, senior presidential secretary for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae, at a seminar sponsored by the "Institute for National Security and Strategy" under the puppet Intelligence Service impudently mentioned the august names of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, describing the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its system as "hereditary." He went the lengths of malignantly defaming the pent-up grudge of the army and people of the DPRK all-out to wipe out the rat-like Lee group as a "new phase of accusations against the south."
					
					 Chon dared to trumpet about "limit" and "change" in the DPRK, disclosing his undisguised aim to escalate the confrontation of systems.
					
					 This is another hideous provocation pushing the inter-Korean relations to an extreme pitch of tension.
					
					 What Chon uttered as a lackey of Chongwadae, the den of rats, suggests that the Lee group is much upset by condemnation of its high treason.
					
					 As for Chon, he is the closest confident of traitor Lee Myung Bak and wicked confrontation maniac. When the DPRK launched Kwangmyongsong-2 in 2009, he jabbered "he couldn't understand the north as it squandered money for space development at hard time for it." When he was vice minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade in 2010, this guy called for "sanctions against the north" while trumpeting about "someone's collapse." 
					
					 Lee let even Chon make reckless remarks in an effort to save his face even a bit and justify his vicious moves to escalate the confrontation by misleading the public opinion as he was driven into a tight corner by the might of the angry service personnel and people of the DPRK and the domestic and foreign public condemnation of his thrice-cursed high treason.
					
					 The recent disclosure of more scandals of his confidents such as Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee, threw Lee and his group into a bottomless predicament. The smear campaign kicked off by Lee was aimed at preventing the public attention from being focused on him in a bid to weather his ruling crisis and rally the conservative forces and turn the situation before the "presidential" election favorable to him.
					
					 That is why south Korean media and political circles and even the puppet ruling quarters are critical of Chon's remarks, commenting they were prompted by "ignorance and misjudgment of the north" and "it is not good to repeatedly rattle the nerves of the north" and "they were designed to bring about a turn in the phase for tiding over the internal crisis".
					
					 The outbursts let loose by Chon indicate that Lee Myung Bak is making desperate efforts by setting in motion even his mandarins, finding it hard to escape thunder-like strikes after daring point an accusing finger at the sky.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the group of traitors to talk about someone's "limit" and "change" after being cursed and denounced before meeting a punishment for its crimes against the nation and people.
					
					 It is none other than the Lee group which has been put into a critical situation by the mindset of south Korean people and the resentment of all Koreans. It is the group which should undergo changes and deserves punishment. 
					
					 There is a saying call a spade a spade. If Chon wants to talk about heredity, he should take issue, first of all, with the heredity of "yusin" fascist dictatorship rejected and opposed by the south Korean people. If he wants to talk about changes, he should refer to the call for abolishing the corrupt unpopular system and the pro-U.S. regime for confrontation with fellow countrymen, the unanimous demand of the people from all walks of life, and respond to it. 
					
					 For Chon to act in collusion with Lee Myung Bak more dead than alive to shake his fist towards the sun is as foolish an act as digging his own grave. 
					
					 The Lee group's invectives are nothing but squeaks made by the rats before meeting deaths in face of the angry people. 
					
					 The more desperately this group of rats does mischief, bitterer hatred and resentment it will touch off among the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the further it will precipitate their doomsday. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will wipe out not only the boss of the rat-like traitors but also his yes men who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership and its system. 
					
					 Those who hurt the dignity and the system should bear in mind that they will not be able to escape the most miserable death in face of the strikes of the Songun army of the DPRK as is the case with the ratty Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: GFTUK Chairman Denounces Lee Group's Hideous Crimes
articles.content:
GFTUK Chairman Denounces Lee Group's Hideous Crimes
  Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea in a statement on Friday declared that the workers of the DPRK are fully ready to form a steel-strong workers corps and workers division for special action so that they may join the special action group of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and wipe out the rat-like group to the last one. 
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Even now when the anger of the army and people of the DPRK has reached an extreme pitch, rat-like Lee let loose ridiculous remarks about "change of system" of someone and  "agricultural reform," appearing here and there, failing to come to his senses. Not content with this, he dared to talk about "striking at the supreme headquarters through an office window," showcasing a missile not worth notice. 
					
					 This is the last-ditch effort of Lee Myung Bak who has gone mad beyond remedy before meeting his miserable end. 
					
					 No matter how desperately the rat-like group of Lee squeaks to defame the system and single-minded unity of the DPRK, they can never shake the mainstay of the firm confidence of its army and people. 
					
					 The rat-like Lee group keen to amass illicit money in a dark hole can neither understand nor gauge the great mental power and tremendous might of the army and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the spirit of the army and people not to pardon anyone hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership even a bit. 
					
					 The Lee group should clearly know that their dirty lives hang in the balance.

articles.title: Congratulations from Cambodian Political Party
articles.content:
Congratulations from Cambodian Political Party
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Chea Sim, chairman of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia, on April 17. 
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency
					
					 On hearing that Your Excellency was elected first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the 4th conference of the WPK, I would like to extend warm congratulations to you on behalf of the Central Committee of the PPC and myself.
					
					 This significant event is an expression of the WPK's absolute trust in you leading the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I would like to express my best wishes for your good health and victory in your noble cause.
					
					 It is my hope that the ties of friendship and solidarity between the two parties and peoples will grow stronger in the days ahead.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea led by its Chairman Dmitri Kostenko arrived here by air on Friday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association led by Chairman Mamoru Kitahara visited Mangyongdae.
					 The guests looked round the historic relics there, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary family members of Mangyongdae. 
					
					 They had a photo taken in front of the President's old home and planted trees around it.
					
					 The delegation toured the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					 The President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea.
					
					 The Juche idea clarified that man is the master of everything and decides everything.
					
					 The Juche idea is a great idea to be followed by progressive humankind.
					
					 The delegation visited the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition commemorating the 80th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army, the Hana Music Information Centre and the Tudan Duck Farm.

articles.title: More Rallies Take Place to Vow to Wipe Out Rat-like Lee Group
articles.content:
More Rallies Take Place to Vow to Wipe Out Rat-like Lee Group
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people in North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces of the DPRK met on Friday to vow to wipe out the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group, the sworn enemy, in this land and sky.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people of different social standings and youth and students in the provinces.
					
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers condemned the group of rat-like traitors for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK again, not content with committing the thrice-cursed high treason during the period of mourning the great loss to the nation, and vowed to wipe out them to the last man so that they may not find any shelter on the earth. 
					
					 Intolerable are crimes rat-like Lee committed by setting in motion aged reactionaries, gangster-like students and ultra-right conservative media persons to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, they stressed, and went on:
					
					 As it is a waste to use a bullet for killing rat-like Lee, it is better to leave him hung on the gallows for ten days, nay a hundred days, till he perishes, dried up.
					
					 We will clearly show the group of traitors what terrible strikes the army of Mt. Paektu makes when it gets angry.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will wipe out to the last man the rat-like Lee group going reckless, not fearful of Heaven, by merciless physical strikes and thus achieve the historic cause of the national reunification.
					
					 Then followed protest demonstrations.

articles.title: National Scientific, Technological Festival Opens
articles.content:
National Scientific, Technological Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological festival was opened with due ceremony at the Three Revolution Exhibition on Friday in celebration of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival is divided into 13 panels of light industry, agriculture, foodstuff, railway transport, energy, construction and building materials, basic science, state of the art and others.
					
					 Presented to the festival are achievements of more than 200 units in the process of putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis by pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology together with many research findings of scientists, technicians and working people highly appreciated at local festivals.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet, Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned, scientists, technicians and working people.

articles.title: New Shop Opens in Pyongyang
articles.content:
New Shop Opens in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Mirae Shop for scientists and technicians was opened in Pyongyang on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The shop named "Mirae Shop" by the dear respected Kim Jong Un reflects his noble intention that the prosperity of the country can be guaranteed only by the development of science and technology.
					
					 Available at the shop are a variety of popular goods including daily necessities, electrical appliances and foodstuffs.
					
					 It has facilities for instantly mending the new garment bought there and repairing watches. Also available in the shop are a lift for trolleys, soft-drink stands and other welfare service facilities.
					
					 This shop built on the bank of the picturesque Pothong River boasts of its modern architectural beauty. It is a product of the loving care again shown by the Workers' Party of Korea and the socialist system for the scientists and technicians, regarding them as precious talents.
					
					 The shop welcomed teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and scientists of the State Academy of Sciences who visited there before any others.

articles.title: Combined Fishery Processing and Packing Shops Go Operational
articles.content:
Combined Fishery Processing and Packing Shops Go Operational
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The combined fishery processing and packing shops have been successfully built at the Hungnam Taegyong Fishery Enterprise in South Hamgyong Province.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the orientation and ways of building a modern fishery production and processing base while providing field guidance to the enterprise in January 2010. 
					
					 The commissioning of the shops makes it possible to realize the noble intentions of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un who worked heart and soul to provide the people with a lot of fresh fishes all the year round and thus contribute to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 A commissioning ceremony took place on Friday.

articles.title: Economic Officials Vow to Effect Production Surge
articles.content:
Economic Officials Vow to Effect Production Surge
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the dear respected Kim Jong Un's famous work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche", officials of major economic sectors are full of enthusiasm to thoroughly implement the tasks laid down in the work.
					 Ri Yong Yong, vice-minister of Coal Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 "The work makes us deeply feel Kim Jong Un's noble personality as a great man.
					
					  We will bring about a fresh upsurge in coal production through a dynamic offensive to carry through the tasks set forth in the work."
					
					Kim Jong Ho, vice-minister of Electric Power Industry, said:
					
					 "The work reflects the strong will of Kim Jong Un to improve the power industry, true to the intention of leader Kim Jong Il, who visited the Huichon Power Station under construction several times to solve the shortage of electricity.
					
					 We will work hard to radically raise the production of electricity and make the most effective use of it in developing the economy and bettering the people's livelihood."
					
					 Kim Hyok, department director of the Ministry of Metal Industry, and Kwon Chol, department director of the Ministry of Railways, expressed their resolve to do their best to contribute to consolidating the foundations for the economic development and effecting a fresh upsurge in all sectors of the national economy.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Provocation
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Provocation
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime's provocation to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has stirred up the wrath of its people.
					 Dr. Pak Kil Nam of the Academy of Social Sciences told KCNA:
					
					 "The Lee Myung Bak swarm of rats living at Chongwadae in Seoul reminds me of a classical story 'A Rat in the Dock'.
					
					 In the story the boss of rats is tried at court for having stolen lots of rice from the granary for 10 odd years. This ugly rat makes desperate efforts to evade punishment, picking on all other animals and plants, even the sun and moon.
					
					 Myung Bak is very identical to this boss of rats in deed. Though it committed never-to-be-condoned high treason, the Lee swarm of rats dared to point an accusing finger at the sun.
					
					 The voice of the people is the voice of God. Those rats are bound to be punished by Heaven for having harmed interests of the nation. The history will record another satire disclosing the crimes done by the swarm of rats."

articles.title: Railway Workers Vow to Stamp Out Lee Group of S. Korea
articles.content:
Railway Workers Vow to Stamp Out Lee Group of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Railway workers in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are effecting an upsurge in transport, out of desire to take a reprisal against the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea.
					 Jang Man Chol, a section chief of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau, told KCNA:
					
					 "No matter how desperately rattish Myung Bak and his clan of traitors are running amuck, they can never bar the advance of the DPRK people closely rallied around their leader.
					
					 Our electric locomotive 'Pulgungi (red flag)' will mercilessly crush the Lee swarm of rats to death.
					
					 We are now properly carrying on the organization and direction of transport services with mind to provide munitions to servicepersons in southward advance." 
					
					 Pak Ho Chol, head of the West Pyongyang Service Brigade of Engine, said:
					
					 "Our hearts are burning with the will to take thousand-fold revenge upon the Lee group of traitors who dared slander the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 With will to annihilate the enemies, we will work hard to increase haulage." 
					
					Won Yong Hwal, a locomotive engineer, stressed that rat-like Lee Myong Bak and his clan should never be pardoned.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Gives Courage to Korean People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Gives Courage to Korean People
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's famous work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche", published on April 19, is evoking big responses from local people.
					 Prof. and Dr. Pak Kyong Sik, section chief for scientific research at the Korean Revolution Museum, told KCNA:
					
					 "The work carries the steadfast will of Kim Jong Un to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and remain true to his revolutionary idea and cause.
					
					 It was an ardent desire of all the servicepersons and civilians to have a statue of the leader who performed great feats for the country and the people, the times and history.
					
					 To meet this desire, Kim Jong Un energetically guided the project for building statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill in a very short period with the Day of the Sun (April 15) as an occasion. He also worked heart and soul to spruce up the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and thus realize the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader.
					
					 His intense loyalty and strong sense of moral obligation has touched the world people's hearts."
					
					Jon Hyon Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, said:
					
					 "The work will serve as a great programme for the new centenary of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in the work defined Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guiding idea of the WPK, thus providing an ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 Very bright is the future of our country advancing under the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism."

articles.title: Prize Contest for Rat-catching Method on Discussion in DPRK
articles.content:
Prize Contest for Rat-catching Method on Discussion in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Citizens in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are urging a prize contest for method of killing rat-like Lee Myung Bak of south Korea.
					 Smelters and miners intend to throw Myung Bak into an electric furnace or dead pit while women insist on the way to cut him into pieces with cooking knife.
					
					 After all, voices calling for an outline of prize contest to decide on the best way of catching rat have been growing stronger.
					
					 Ji Hyon Sang, an old man living in Jonjin-dong, Rangnang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA that citizens in his residential quarters had decided to adopt "What is the most satisfied way to kill rat-like Myung Bak?" as a prize contest topic.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 "This topic is now popular among people.
					
					 The period of the contest will last until rat Myung Bak and its swarm are wiped out to the last one.
					
					 A winner in the contest is to be granted a 'privilege' to kill Myung Bak in his or her own way.
					
					 The contest is aimed to send rattish Myung Bak to Heavens for his hideous crimes."

articles.title: Univ. Teachers Volunteer to Work in Difficult Fields
articles.content:
Univ. Teachers Volunteer to Work in Difficult Fields
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Many teachers and graduates from various universities and colleges in the DPRK volunteered to work in difficult and labor-consuming fields including worksites for effecting a great surge in the drive to improve the people's living standard and schools of far-flung villages.
					 Kim Yong Su, engineer of an experimental farm of Kye Ung Sang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University, and his wife Kim Son Hui, staff member of the branch school of the College, volunteered to work on the Phyongam Co-op Farm in Koksan County of North Hwanghae Province and Min Pyong Son, teacher of Haeju Kim Jong Thae University of Education No. 1, decided to proceed to the Wonryong Co-op Farm in Anak County of South Hwanghae Province together with his family.
					
					 Kim Song Nam, researcher of the institute of light industry of Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, also proceeded to the Changsong Foodstuff Factory in Phyongan Province with his family and teachers of various universities volunteered to work in difficult fields.
					
					 14 graduates from Kim Jong Suk University of Education rushed to the worksite for rebuilding and repairing railways in a northern area and Ri Jong Hui, graduate from Kanggye Teacher Training College, volunteered to work as a teacher at a branch of the Unpho secondary school in Jonchon County of Jagang Province.
					
					 Graduates from Sinuiju Cha Kwang Su University of Education No. 1 and Haeju Jo Ok Hui Teacher Training College volunteered to teach at branch schools of island villages, 11 graduates from Sinuiju University of Education No. 2, Sinuiju Teacher Training College and Sonchon Teacher Training College and 24 graduates from Wonsan University of Education and Wonsan Ri Su Dok Teacher Training College to teach at schools on the forefront and in rural villages. 10 odd graduates from Hamhung University of Education, Hamhung Choe Hui Suk Teacher Training College No. 1 and Hamhung Teacher Training College No. 2 and others volunteered to work in Taehung and Komdok areas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating Traitors in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating Traitors in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north, south and abroad are called on to turn out as one in the nationwide patriotic struggle to wipe out the puppet conservative group in south Korea keen on doing harm to the fellow countrymen and perpetrating hideous provocations and pave a wide avenue for the independent development of the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a byline article.
					
					 The conservative group is the most reactionary forces standing in the way of the independent development of the nation, relying on outsiders, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 No sooner had traitor Lee Myung Bak seized power than shut his eyes to the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and feigned ignorance of their moves to grab Tok Islets, talking about "the era of new cooperation, calling for letting bygones be bygones." Moreover, the traitor sold off the interests of the south Koreans to his American master lock, stock and barrel, kowtowing to him, and escalated confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, the boss of "the Saenuri Party", is daughter of the "yusin" dictator ill-famed as a pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese element. She is eyeing the next term "presidency" under the patronage of the U.S. and Japanese masters. The south Korean conservative group is dominated by pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese elements.
					
					 The said group is an unpardonable quisling force as it rendered society more reactionary through extreme treachery and is going against the people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The rat-like Lee Myung Bak group is kicking off confrontation and war hysteria, malignantly defaming the dignified system of the DPRK and daring hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership. This is aimed at fanning up extreme hostility toward compatriots in south Korean society and chilling the enthusiasm of the people to punish the regime of traitors.
					
					 It is an urgent requirement of the times and prerequisite to improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving peace and the independent reunification of the country to eliminate the ultra-right conservative group in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Military Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Military Drill
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The 35th Division of the south Korean puppet army announced its plan to stage a madcap Hwarang, Chungmu drill across North Jolla Province from April 30 to May 4, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The drill aimed to increase combined operational capability will be staged under the simulated conditions of a local war, all-out war and conversion of everything into wartime conditions with aggression forces under the division as well as the provincial office and police and other major administration organs involved.
					
					 After perpetrating hideous provocations unprecedented in the national history without hesitation, the group of traitors is busy with war exercises in a desperate bid to invade the DPRK.

articles.title: Early Elimination of Pro-US Warmongers Urged
articles.content:
Early Elimination of Pro-US Warmongers Urged
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification Monday released a statement titled "Let patriotic people wipe out the pro-U.S. warmongers for confrontation as early as possible" denouncing warmongers hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and inciting confrontation madness.
					 The statement denounced the U.S. for not only violating the February 29 DPRK-U.S. agreement by describing the satellite launch by the DPRK as the launch of missile but cooking up the UNSC presidential statement recently, creating an extreme danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Lee Myung Bak, stooge of the U.S. and Japan, is kicking up extreme confrontation hysteria, kowtowing to the U.S. in a bid to save himself from a miserable fate.
					
					 The resentment of the army and people of the north at the warmongers is running high, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 Lee should apology for his crimes at once, his knees bent, and step down from power.
					
					 All the patriotic people will wage a more dynamic struggle for eliminating the Lee group and thus bring it to the court of history.

articles.title: Koreans in China Accuse S. Korea of Defaming Event of Nation
articles.content:
Koreans in China Accuse S. Korea of Defaming Event of Nation
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning branch of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on April 23 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for malignantly defaming the great event of the nation.
					 The statement recalled that the Korean nation and world progressives celebrated with splendor the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung as the greatest festival in history.
					
					 However, the Lee group ran the whole gamut of invectives desecrating the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 All Koreans in China condemn the rash acts of the Lee group and strongly demand it make immediate apology for defaming the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					
					  All Koreans in China will join the people in the homeland in the sacred war of retaliation by giving full vent to the pent-up grudge, unless traitor Lee apologizes for his crimes.
					
					 The Shenyang City branch in a statement on the same day said that the rat-like Lee's outbursts are no more than the last-ditch efforts to break the single-minded unity in the DPRK and quell the strong response evoked by the events, come what may.
					
					 The statement termed Lee the sworn enemy of the nation with whom Koreans can never live under the same sky as he made desperate efforts to desecrate the great event of the nation, not content with hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Officials Slam Lee Group's Hideous Provocations
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Officials Slam Lee Group's Hideous Provocations
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Personages of organizations of Korean residents in Japan on April 23 made public statements denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					  Ri Chong Gyong, director-general of the Standing Council of the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan, said: The Lee group of traitors staged joint military exercises together with the U.S. when the nation was mourning the big loss to it, bringing the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Not content with this, it committed such hideous provocation as malignantly defaming the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The federation will take the lead in the sacred struggle to make a clean sweep of Lee, confrontation maniac and traitor without an equal, and achieve national reunification, long-cherished desire of the nation, holding aloft the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, assailed the conservative media persons for talking nonsense in league with Lee. He declared that the nation will never pardon all the crimes committed by the group of traitors.
					
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, Pak Tong Ho, chairman of the Korean Students Union in Japan, and Ku Tae Sok, chairman of the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan, stated that Lee would be forced to pay a dear price for his reckless confrontation racket.
					
					 They called on the Koreans in Japan to turn out in the struggle to eliminate the group of traitors.

articles.title: Actions for Denouncing Lee Group Staged in Japan
articles.content:
Actions for Denouncing Lee Group Staged in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- An action of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and compatriots was staged on Wednesday in front of the south Korean puppet embassy in Tokyo to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for all ages for seriously hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and perpetrating reckless provocations.
					 The dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation is dearer than the lives of the Koreans in Japan who live, their chests thrown out, with the national pride of holding the great men of Mt. Paektu in high esteem, they noted, declaring that the Lee group deserves a severe punishment as it hurt the dignity and besmirched the compatriots' loyalty.
					
					 They stressed that the reunification of the country and prosperity of the nation can be achieved only when the rat-like group of traitors are beaten to death.
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and compatriots thrust a written protest to the puppet embassy.
					
					 It warned that the Lee group of traitors would be wiped out to the last man as they dared insult the great men of Mt. Paektu, benefactors of national resurrection, kind-hearted fathers of Koreans in Japan and protectors of their destinies.
					
					 And the participants staged a demonstration march.
					
					 Similar protests of Koreans in Japan were staged in front of the puppet consulates in Sapporo, Nagoya, Osaka, Kobe, Hiroshima and Fukuoka on April 26.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Meet to Extend Thanks to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Meet to Extend Thanks to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on April 24 to extend thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un for sending educational aid funds and stipend to the children of the Koreans in Japan.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, officials of Chongryon Headquarters in Kanto and its chapters, Koreans in Japan, teachers and students of Joson University and Korean schools in Kanto area,  Korean scientists and Korean students studying at Japanese schools.
					
					 Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and concurrently chairman of its National Rights Committee, in a report extended highest glory and warmest thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending a large amount of educational aid funds and stipend on the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Pae said that a steady continuity is given to the history of love shown by the peerless great persons thanks to Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, praising him as a tender-hearted father of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Pae called for glorifying forever the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the development of democratic national education of Chongryon. He underscored the need for the Koreans in Japan to get united close around the Chongryon organization and wage a dynamic struggle to protect and expand the right to national education by holding fast to the national education as a lifeline of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A message of thanks to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Lee Group's Hideous Crimes under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Group's Hideous Crimes under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), released a statement on April 21 denouncing the rat-like Lee Myung Bak for committing again such hideous crime as hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					 Noting that ridiculous traitor Lee is prolonging his dirty life under the patronage of the U.S. and Japanese masters committed such high treason as insulting the great men of Mt. Paektu, destiny of the nation and benefactors of lives of Koreans in Japan, the statement declared that the nation would never pardon it.
					
					 The statement said: 
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un in his historical speech made at a parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung clarified his broadminded and positive stand that the DPRK would join hands with anyone who wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that traitor Lee reacted to it with an unpardonable conspiratorial burlesque.
					
					 The Lee group should clearly know that they would not be able to escape a severe punishment for committing high treason in a bid to quell the desire of the fellow countrymen through a racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The anger of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan is running high and they would decisively turn out in a nationwide struggle for wiping out the Lee group.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will take the lead in making a breakthrough towards independent reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un by upholding and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Russian and Polish figures paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries from April 14 to 18 in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and in congratulation of the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 They included the first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and his party, the first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation and his party and members of the Secretariat of the Union of Polish Communist Youth.
					
					 They placed floral baskets and bouquets before full-length portraits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that it is the biggest exploit performed by Kim Jong Un that he held Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 A congratulatory speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade celebrating the 100th anniversary of the President's birth was a beacon that illumined the way ahead of not only the Korean people but the progressive people valuing justice, the firs secretary noted.
					
					 The tremendous military capacity of the DPRK guarantees the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia, he said, adding he would strive to develop relations with the WPK in the future.
					
					 The Khabarovsk Regional Political Council of the "United Russia" Party, the Amur Region Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory and the Russia-Korea Children's Friendship Association Named after Kim Jong Il of 11th Middle School in Khabarovsk City sent bouquets to the DPRK missions.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- An international organisation figure and Chinese organizations sent floral baskets to DPRK missions on April 12 congratulating the DPRK on invariably holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea forever and electing the dear respected Kim Jong Un as first secretary of WPK. They included the chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, the Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission, Emperor Group and the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., of Hong Cong, China.

articles.title: UNSC Has No Right to Accuse Satellite Launch: Foreign Groups
articles.content:
UNSC Has No Right to Accuse Satellite Launch: Foreign Groups
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism denounced the presidential statement of the UNSC accusing the DPRK of launching satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 and expressed support to the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the statement of the spokesman for the Korean Committee of Space Technology.
					 The organization in its statement on April 19 said the UNSC has neither ground nor right to find fault with the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The above-said presidential statement reflects the ulterior design of powers including the U.S. to oppose the DPRK's development of science and technology and its growing national power from A to Z, noted the statement.
					
					 The U.S. suspended even the already promised process of food aid under the pretext of satellite launch, the statement noted, adding this was a wanton violation of the February 29 agreement and its undisguised abrogation.
					
					 On the same day the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association expressed their support for the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued in denunciation of the presidential statement of the UNSC.
					
					 The organizations in their statement said it is an inviolable sovereign right for the DPRK to steadily push ahead with its space development program.
					
					 It voiced support for the DPRK's declaration that it would no longer be bound to the February 29 DPRK-U.S. agreement.

articles.title: Peruvian Organization Appreciates Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
articles.content:
Peruvian Organization Appreciates Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued a statement on April 20 as regards the publication of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche".
					 The work serves as an action program for developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and hastening the victory of the Juche cause, socialist cause, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK, the statement said.
					
					 As clarified in the work, Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the invariable guiding idea of the WPK and Songun Korea and, at the same time, the only guidelines for the activities of the Group, the statement added.
					
					 It said the Group would study Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism more deeply and widely disseminate Kim Jong Un's work among political parties, organizations and people of Peru.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the great idea guiding the new century, it said.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birthday Celebrated Worldwide: Nepali Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birthday Celebrated Worldwide: Nepali Papers
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Nepali papers carried special write-ups interwoven with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos between March 31 and April 17 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Jana Sata in an article titled "Among the people" said that the President led the Korean revolution to victory. Its bottom line was his noble outlook on the people as he always shared destiny with them.
					
					 He wisely led the revolution and construction with his encyclopedic knowledge and extraordinary leadership art all his life, it noted.
					
					 Janmabhumi reported a similar article.
					
					 Another Nepali paper said that the centenary of the birth of the President was being celebrated worldwide, adding that the Juche idea founded by him serves as a powerful weapon for waging the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.
					
					 Charcha noted that the Korean people and the world progressives were recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats of the President.
					
					 A Nepali newspaper in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, holding high the banner of independence" praised him for his undying feats for the human cause of independence.
					
					 Rahasha in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung as seen by Billy Graham" cited a lot of facts proving that foreign personages deeply admired the President as a great man.
					
					 Sremik lauded him as the great leader of not only the Korean people but of the world progressive people.

articles.title: Pyongyang's Spring Landscape Introduced by ITAR-TASS
articles.content:
Pyongyang's Spring Landscape Introduced by ITAR-TASS
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- ITAR-TASS of Russia on April 23 introduced the spring landscape in Pyongyang.
					 The Pyongyang streets of the DPRK have been decorated beautifully with the advent of spring, it said, and went on:
					
					  Soft pink flowers of many apricot trees are decorating Pyongyang streets, emitting fragrance. Blooming azaleas add to the beautiful landscape. Azalea is as popular in Korea as magnolia.
					
					 Snow-like white magnolia has long been considered as a symbol of purity.
					
					 A lot of beautiful flowers and trees are being planted in different parts of the DPRK.
					
					 No wonder, Pyongyang is garbed in rainbow color in spring. April in the DPRK proves the true meaning of the nomenclature "Korea", the land of morning calm.

articles.title: Events Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Events Celebrate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in the Czech Republic, Hungary, Belarus, Poland, Germany, Mongolia, Pakistan and Ethiopia from April 2 to 17 in celebration of 100 years since the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Reading session on Kim Il Sung's work, round-table talks, film show and book, photo and handicraft exhibition took place in Ethiopia, Uganda and the Netherlands.
					
					 On display at the venues were works of the President and leader Kim Jong Il, photos of their exploits, book and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the resourcefulness and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Films shown included "Arms of Korea" and "Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said at a meeting that the President is always with them.
					
					 The chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party praised the President as great father of the Korean people who devoted all his life to the country's liberation and the people's freedom and happiness as well as a world political elder who devoted his all to global peace and security and human cause of independence. 
					
					 The chairman of the Belarus Association for the Study of Juche Idea expressed the conviction that the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by Kim Il Sung and carried forward by Kim Jong Il will be successfully carried to completion under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association said the President provided the Koreans with the most advantageous socialist system and made great contributions to the country's prosperity and global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea said all the miraculous events in the DPRK would have been unthinkable without the wise guidance of the President.
					
					 The secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said that the august name and exploits of the President will be immortal, noting that he made tremendous contributions to the human cause of independence.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at events in Hungary, Germany and Mongolia.

articles.title: China Flays Japanese Politicians' Visit to "Yasukuni Shrine"
articles.content:
China Flays Japanese Politicians' Visit to "Yasukuni Shrine"
 Beijing, April 26 (KCNA) -- Liu Weimin, spokesman for the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, at a press conference on Wednesday denounced a group of Japanese politicians for visiting "Yasukuni Shrine" recently.
					 Liu said that the issue of visit to the shrine is a matter of how Japan deals with its history of militarist aggression as it is related to the feelings of broad strata of people of those countries which suffered from it.
					
					 China has consistently held that Japan should settle this issue prudently and properly in the spirit of foreseeing future, drawing from the lesson taught by history, the spokesman stressed.

articles.title: Iran to React to Israeli Threat: Iranian FM
articles.content:
Iran to React to Israeli Threat: Iranian FM
 Tehran, April 26 (KCNA) -- Ali Akbar Salehi, foreign minister of Iran, at a press conference on April 23 clarified his country's stand to strongly react to any threat of Israel.
					 Israel is, in fact, part of U.S. imperialism existing in the region, he said, adding Iran would strongly react to any form of Israeli threat.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio tactico general de unidad 655 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio tactico general de unidad 655 de EPC
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento tactico general de la Unidad Combinada 655 del EPC efectuado con motivo del 80o aniversario de la fundacion del EPC.
					Para acoger al Comandante Supremo, estaban ante el mirador del campo de entrenamiento el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Jong Gak, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general del EPC Choe Pu Il, y el coronel general del EPC Son Chol Ju.
					
					Esperaban en el mismo terreno Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, Pak Jae Gyong, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Yun Jong Rin, Jo Kyong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, los integrantes del CDN, los miembros de mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC, los miembros directivos de grandes unidades combinadas del EPC.
					
					Lo vieron tambien Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Pak To Chun, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Kwak Pom Gi, O Il Jong, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Han Kwang Sang, Kim Myong Guk y otros cuadros directivos de las instituciones del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, los miembros del organo directivo central del Partido en esta capital, los funcionarios de ministerios, organos centrales y de sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa, informacion e industria de defensa nacional, oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					Tras recibir el saludo de recepcion del jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el Comandante Supremo subio al mirador, donde escucho las explicaciones sobre el proyecto de proceso del entrenamiento y la ubicacion de las unidades participantes en el ejercicio.
					
					Kim Jong Un dio la orden de inicio del entrenamiento.
					
					Al momento estremecieron el cielo y la tierra el estruendoso sonido de explosion y canonazos que dan los medios de ataque de fuego.
					
					Las valientes aviaciones dieron sucesivos golpes contra blancos.
					
					Los tanques y carros blindados entraron en la "posicion enemiga" estremeciendo la tierra y los combatientes listos para combatir uno contra cien enemigos ocuparon de improviso los puestos de los "enemigos".
					
					En medio de canonazos estruendosos, la "posicion enemiga" se convirtio en un instante en un mar de fuego.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso su satisfaccion por el exito del entrenamiento que haya materializado el autoctono metodo de combate e indico las tareas programaticas que se presenten para perfeccionar los preparativos del combate del EPC:
					
					Hay que seguir concentrando gran fuerza a fortalecer el EPC para llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu.
					
					Es necesario formar a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC como los competentes combatientes armados con la invencible estrategia y tacticas de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, y con los metodos de ataque audaz y perfecta capacidad de combate real.
					
					Hay que aniquilar despiadadamente con las fuerzas armadas de justicia y venganza a los enemigos, si estos muestren cualquier movimiento minimo provocativo.
					
					Kim Jong Un dijo que gracias al heroico EPC, fila selecta de acero e invencible destacamento, fortalecido bajo la atencion del Presidente          Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il durante los 80 anos, nuestro regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares brillara para siempre como baluarte inquebrantable.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto a los importantes miembros de mando del EPC, los integrantes de mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC, los miembros directivos de grandes unidades combinadas del EPC y otros funcionarios acompanantes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Oruesta Unhasu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de Oruesta Unhasu
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los capitalinos, vio en el Palacio del Pueblo el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu "No olvidemos el juramento tomado ante la revolucion" dedicado al 80o aniversario de la fundacion del EPC.
					En la escena del concierto iniciado con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional se pusieron diversas piezas tales como el preludio "No olvidemos el juramento tomado ante la revolucion", el duo masculino y coro "Defenderemos a Hanbyol", la musica orquestal y coro, "A la guerra antijaponesa", obra maestra inmortal, el cuarteto mixto y coro "Cancion al Mariscal Kim Il Sung", el quinteto femenino "Cantamos nuestra patria dirigida por el Lider", el coro "Tharyong del monte Sin-ko", el solo femenino y pangchang "Cancion de amor por el pueblo", el cuarteto de ninos "Somos felices", el coro "Ordene, Lider", el solo femenino "En pos de la bandera del Partido", la narracion y musica orquestal "Nuestro fusil dice", el coro "Adelante Corea", etc.
					
					Los ejecutantes mostraron bien que gracias a las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, brilla la gloriosa centuria de la Corea del Juche y la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en el cargo cimero del PTC, el Estado y el ejercito abre ante Corea un futuro radiante.
					
					El concierto termino con la interpretacion del himno revolucionario "Cancion del General          Kim Il Sung".
					
					Kim Jong Un se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas de la Orquesta Unhasu hayan ofrecido excelente funcion.
					
					Diciendo que la Orquesta Unhasu es una entidad artistica criada personalmente por Kim Jong Il, dio maxima evaluacion a ella.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los artistas de dicha entidad libraran dinamicas actividades artisticas revolucionarias para llamar con mas vigor al ejercito y el pueblo a la marcha general de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					La vieron tambien Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Kyong Ok y Kim Myong Guk.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia disparate de Chon Yong U
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia disparate de Chon Yong U
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 27 la siguiente informacion no. 996:
					El pasado dia 23, en un llamado seminario auspiciado por el "Instituto para Seguridad Nacional y Estrategia" adscrito al titere Servicio de Inteligencia, Chon Yong U, jefe de diplomacia y seguridad de Chongwadae (casa azul), acuso la maxima dignidad y el sistema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de una "herencia" deshonrando atrevidamente los nombres de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu. Y en cuanto a las voces indignadas de los uniformados y civiles de la RPDC para exterminar a los ratones acaudillados por Lee Myung Bak lo califico maliciosamente de "nueva coyuntura para criticar el Sur".
					
					Asi revelo abiertamente su malsana intencion de confrontacion fratricida refiriendose a "punto critico" y el "cambio" en la RPDC.
					
					Esto es otra provocacion tremenda que lleva la situacion al peor limite.
					
					La maldicion de este ratoncito Chon parece que la banda de Lee Myung Bak se haya atemorizado mucho por las voces de condena a sus crimenes.
					
					Cuando la RPDC lanzo el satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-2" en el ano 2009, Chon la acuso diciendo que "no comprende por que el Norte de Corea gasta fondos al desarrollo del cosmos cuando es dificil de vivir". En 2010 en que se encargaba de viceministro titere de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio preconizo la "sancion anti-Norte" hablando de la "teoria de derrumbe" de alguien.
					
					El traidor Lee Myung Bak presento hasta Chon Yong U para difamar a la RPDC con el fin de mantener su honra desbaratada por las fuerzas armadas de militares y civiles indignados de la RPDC sobre los tremendos actos provocadores cometidos ante la nacion y por la condena de la opinion publica interior y el exterior del pais. Y ademas persigue desviar a la opinion publica para justificar las perversas maniobras de confrontacion. 
					
					Ultimamente, la situacion de Lee se torno mas incomoda todavia al estallar los escandalos de corrupcion de sus hombres como Choe Si Jung, ex presidente del Comite de Radiodifusion y Comunicacion.
					
					Asi que le fue necesario lanzar otra campana anti-RPDC para distraer la atencion publica de los casos de corrupcion, reparar su crisis de dominacion e invertir las desfavorables perspectivas de elecciones "presidenciales".
					
					 No por casualidad, en los medios de prensa y hasta en el circulo politico y la capa gobernante del Sur de Corea flotaron las criticas a los disparates de Chon Yong U.
					
					Al sostener que "no conviene provocar tanto al Norte", los criticadores opinan que la chismografia de Chon es producto de la "ignorancia y equivocacion del Norte" y sirve "para cambiar la situacion con vistas a superar la crisis interna".
					
					 El hecho demuestra que el traidor Lee Myung Bak, sometido a la avalancha de duras condenas por haber difamado la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, recurre ahora a cometer esta maldad por conducto de sus inferiores.
					
					 Es muy ridiculo que la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos, a punto de subir al cadalso condenada por la opinion publica por el cargo de acciones antinacionales y antipopulares, haya advertido a alguien sobre el "punto limite" y aconsejado el "cambio".
					
					 Quien esta al punto limite con el arruinamiento final y debe ser cambiada y sentenciada es precisamente la banda de traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					Si quiere decir de la herencia, Chon deberia cuestionar la herencia de la dictadura fascista de "renovacion" y rechazada por los habitantes surcoreanos. 
					
					Si quiere hablar del cambio, el deberia referirse a la liquidacion del regimen antipopular y el "poder" proyanqui de confrontacion fratricida segun la unanime demanda de los habitantes de distintos sectores  del Sur de Corea y materializarlo.
					
					Es tan ridiculo que Chon ofenda el Sol en adhesion al traidor Lee, cadaver vivo.
					
					La peroracion de la banda de Lee no pasa de ser una chillada de los ratones ahogados en el mar de indignacion de la opinion publica. 
					
					Cuanto mas la banda ratonesca Lee calumnia mas a la RPDC tanto mas se aumentaran la colera y el odio del ejercito y el pueblo de esta y se acercara mas la hora de su muerte.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos aniquilaran a todos ratones que ofendan la maxima dignidad y el  regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Los que calumnian y ofendan la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC no evitaran el fin tragico siendo blanco de fusil del Songun como el raton Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: Estan formados cuerpos de obreros para castigar a MB, senala FGSC
articles.content:
Estan formados cuerpos de obreros para castigar a MB, senala FGSC
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC), en su declaracion fechada 29, subrayo:
					La clase obrera de Corea ya formo los cuerpos y divisiones de obreros de acero dispuestos a tomar parte junto con el grupo de operaciones y acciones especiales de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea en la accion especial para liquidar a la banda ratonesca de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					En estos momentos tambien cuando llega al limite la indignacion de militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el traidor Lee sigue cometiendo acciones provocativas hablando aqui y alla del supuesto "cambio del regimen" y "reforma agraria" (en la RPDC) y circulando el "rumor de ataque a la Direccion Suprema (de la RPDC) por la ventana de su oficina" con unos misiles de chatarra.
					
					Esto no pasa de ser el ultimo coletazo del traidor Lee caido en la agonia.
					
					Si bien Lee y sus compinches intentan con desesperacion destruir el regimen y la unidad monolitica de la RPDC, no podran corroer con sus dientes de rata el sosten espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo de ella.
					
					La banda de Lee, que piensa unicamente en acumular riquezas ilicitamente, no puede imaginar ni calcular la enorme fuerza espiritual y el inagotable poderio del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Estos tienen el temperamento de no perdonar ni un comino a los que se atrevan a ofender su maxima dignidad.
					
					Los ratones acaudillados por Lee deben darse cuenta de que estan en peligro sus sucias vidas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a exterminar a los traidores a la nacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a exterminar a los traidores a la nacion
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que todos los compatriotas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben levantarse unanimemente en la lucha patriotica pannacional por aniquilar a la banda de conservadores surcoreanos, que comete actos de provocacion cada vez mas grandes en contra de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y por abrir las posibilidades de desarrollo independiente de la nacion coreana.
					Esa camarilla es la fuerza mas reaccionaria que obstaculiza el desarrollo independiente de la nacion manteniendo su vida con el servilismo a las fuerzas extranjeras, comienza el articulo y continua:
					
					Tan pronto como tomara el poder, pregonando la "epoca de nueva cooperacion que no cuestiona el pasado", el traidor Lee Myung Bak hizo vista gorda de los crimenes cometidos en el siglo pasado por el imperialismo japones contra el pueblo coreano y de los pasos de reaccionarios japoneses encaminados a usurpar el islote coreano Tok.
					
					Lee vendio a su amo norteamericano los intereses de los habitantes surcoreanos y en contubernio con EE.UU., libro frenetica campana conflictiva anti-RPDC.
					
					Park Geun-hye quien tomo el control del "Partido Saenuri" es hija del infame dictador de "renovacion" proyanqui y projapones.
					
					Ella pretende ocupar la proxima "presidencia" con el apoyo de sus amos gringo y japones. La camarilla de conservadores surcoreanos esta integrada por tales elementos proyanquis y projaponeses.
					
					Esos traidores a la nacion convierten el Sur de Corea en una sociedad cada vez mas reaccionaria desafiando a la aspiracion del pueblo a la independencia, democracia y reunificacion.
					
					La banda ratonesca de Lee Myung Bak intenta infundir en la sociedad surcoreana la hostilidad a los connacionales y aplacar el entusiasmo de sentenciar al actual "poder" traidor calumniando siniestramente el digno sistema de la RPDC y ofendiendo atrevidamente su maxima dignidad.
					
					La liquidacion de las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea es la demanda apremiante de la epoca y premisa fundamental del mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas y la paz y reunificacion independiente del pais.
